patthana16.31:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
patthana16.31:0.3_0: nervously, this is the cause of rapture.
patthana16.31:1.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the rapture and bliss born of rapture.
patthana16.31:1.1_2: whose majority has not been shared.
patthana16.31:2.1_0: Nor do they arise because of rapture.
